name: Accompanied by my curses
description:
This was supposed to be a game for Brackeys game jam 2022.2 but i wasn't able to upload due to issues with pyinstaller. In the game you play as a dwarf who is on a mission to kill an evil demon.  He has three tries to beat the boss before he is lost forever. However every time he dies he is brought to a mystic shop where he can spend souls in order to buy new gear, but each piece comes with a curse. See if you can beat the evil demon!

The game misses polish like a menu and may have some bugs (due to the time limit of a game jam). Who knows? Please report any issues you might find with the game!

The game includes sound effects from Mixit.
